content:
# The crafting was successful, and I now have 1 stone furnace in my inventory, along with 5 stones and 10 iron ore. 

# Step 8: Place the stone furnace to start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Place the stone furnace in the world

# Step 9: Load the stone furnace with iron ore to begin the smelting process.
load_resource(Prototype.StoneFurnace, 'iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Load all 10 iron ore into the furnace

# Step 10: Start the smelting process.
start_smelting(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Start the smelting operation

# Step 11: Check the inventory to see the results after some time.
print(f"Inventory after starting smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")
